contextual_notes: The user was focused on specific smartphone features, indicating a technical interest.

general_insights: Providing detailed and relevant information early in the conversation can significantly boost user satisfaction.
Maintaining engagement and ensuring all user queries are addressed can prevent satisfaction drops towards the end of a conversation.
Understanding user priorities (e.g., camera quality, battery life) can help tailor responses to meet their specific needs.
